Package GA_Runner

Class GeneticAlgorithm

java.lang.Object
GA_Runner.GeneticAlgorithm
public class GeneticAlgorithm extends Object
This is the GeneticAlgorithm class which is responsible for creating the instance. This is where the Singleton Pattern is implemented. There is only a need of one instance where that instance parameters should be modifed to get the result. This allows better consistency and makes sure all the function are working on the same data. It is responsible for creating the context of each of the methods. It also holds the run() function which is where the user interacts and can change the choice in the class for the methods and enters the input for the gene-length and population You can alter the selection, crossover and mutation types by using the appropriate enumerations here Getting and Setting the fittest and secondFittest which are used to evaluate Individuals for our calculation can be accessed the setters and getters
